website_summaries.verdict: A top-of-the-line jig kit by a top name that comes with numerous useful accessories and tools ideal for the hobby or professional carpenter. An investment for your tool collection.
pros: Comes with numerous items needed to accomplish almost any task, including a sturdy jig for portable or bench top use, large clamp and dust collection system
Backed by Kreg's lifetime drill guide warranty
cons: It's the most expensive kit we considered, but you get a lot of tools for the price
Case is somewhat flimsy and doesn't hold all of the components

customer_reviews.title: Over priced and over hyped. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The actual jig itself is solId, however the square drive bit is complete garbage and it started to become stripped after 5-6 screws ( yes I made sure I was square when using it) as are their proprietary screws. The clamp is cheaply made. The only thing made in the USA is the drill bit. Complete crap for the price. It should only cost half of what is does now.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Very strong attractive looking pocket holes. I used it to build a dresser and it was very easy to set up pocket holes to screw together all the pieces. The screw kit is a good value, I haven't really used the other attachments, the wood chips are large and not airborne. I wouldn't really want a vacuum running the whole time I am using this not was clean up hard. The square drive tends to cam out a good amount, I really wish they had gone with a torx head, if I can find pocket hole screws with a torx that would be a good change.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The Kreg K4 kit was what I was looking for to help making corners for a bunch of slide out shelves. Aside from the product itself the Kreg online videos where extremely helpful. Like all carpentry work and especially cabinetry, setup and dead on dimensioning and cutting are a must. I found the Kreg paddle clamp helpful but they allowed for more twist in the joint than I was willing to accept. As an additional purchase I would recommend the pocket hole clamp that has a pin that directly sits in the hole. Still need to drive the screw slowly but the twist is eliminated.
customer_reviews.author: Outside C

customer_reviews.title: Confusing Product for Us
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for several years and have tried to use it multiple times. I’m sure it is great for a person who works with wood all the time but we bought this because we thought it was easy for all skill levels and it wasn’t. We only used it a handle of times, when some chair we purchased started getting rocky my husband attempted to use this to make them sturdier but it just didn’t work. It could be user error as I said we are not furniture builders but for us, it was just too complicated to figure out. Now it just sits in our garage collecting dust.
customer_reviews.author: 1CrazyLife4Me

customer_reviews.title: An excellent option
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting one of these pocket hole jigs for some time. Reading the directions and taking you time the first “go round” seems to result in a quality joint. My first use was fairly involved so I was able to refine my technique with tool. This is another method of joinery that gives me another option. The tool is well made and pretty easy to operate. Again I’d recommend reading the directions and possibly watching a couple of videos. The Kreg website is very helpful and informative too. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bucyrus Oglethorpe III

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my Kreg pocket hole jig Jr years ago when they first became available and have enjoyed using it but I really wanted to upgrade to this kit ever since it came out but I just couldn’t bite the bullet for cash but when I messed up about $100 worth of red oak because of my worn out slipping and loose jig I decided it’s time. Wow I wish I would have upgraded earlier, what a different! This system is great when you can get by without mortising joints, a time saving & clean jointing system.
customer_reviews.author: Steel414

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This equipment drastically improves workflow. You can drill and connect three 30 by 14 boxes in 20 mins (if all the pieces have been cut to appropriate lengths). The vice action holder makes this priceless. Be careful to set your depth on the drill or you will drill through the bottom (though not bad .. but will have holes on you jig). also the detachable piece is very reliable for big bulky pieces. I owned the smaller 2 hole jig and that was a pain to secure .. this is 1000X better!!!
customer_reviews.author: Buka

customer_reviews.title: why didn't I get this years ago!1
customer_reviews.text: I am not a professional woodworker by any stretch of the imagination, so anything that helps me and makes a nice, tight, strong, joint between two pieces of wood is a blessing to me. I simply love this and the things it has allowed me to create that I would not have before. It has also caused me to start employing other jointry methods that I had not tried before such as dowels, routered joints, dove tails, and box joints. I highly recommend this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made the hubby happy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband so I don’t know anything at all about what it supposed to do or how it is supposed to work. But my husband is a fanatic about quality and he is a perfectionist when it comes to anything he makes or fixes ( which is a lot!) and he is really happy with this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Deniece Beekman

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Value / Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of the tools used to perform the connections. It makes your job much more efficient and accurate. The biggest issue I have with this purchase was the closure latches on the storage case. They're PLASTIC. What the thought process was for that is beyond me. The case is very stout, but Kreg dropped the ball completely on the latch.
customer_reviews.author: Lionel Gautreaux

customer_reviews.title: The best product Kreg makes
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty much like welding wood together, it's not coming apart unless you take it apart. Much better than gluing if you have the ability to hide the holes, like in the back side of the drawer or front followed by 3/16" dress veneer over the front to cover the holes.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Concealed holes
customer_reviews.text: It took me a few times a practice to make sure that I got it down I wish they included a DVD with it but about four or five times and you can get it pretty good the hardest part was figuring out what screw size to use but it strong hold without glue but I do recommend using glue on top and a couple clamps where you want to put your joint at makes a lot easier when your beginner I plan on buying more from Kreg down the line
customer_reviews.author: dale hall

customer_reviews.title: AWWWEEESSSSOOOOMMMMEEEEE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am not really a carpenter by any right. In fact- for the most part I have no idea what I am doing. I am reasonably smart and know how to follow directions, but this Jig was so incredible. My boss flipped out at the things I build in our shop with this little tool. You could pay $500 for this thing and if you use it for two projects you would more than pay for it in the amount of time you save not having to do fancy biscuit joints or glue etc... I will say that the screws can be pricy but really, if its worth building, its worth building well, and this little tool saves the day.
customer_reviews.author: Danny J.

customer_reviews.title: great tool for the shop
customer_reviews.text: Great all inclusive kit. I used it to help make an art table for my kids and it's a breeze drilling pocket holes with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: bcruz729

customer_reviews.title: Great investment! Stronger and nicer finished projects
customer_reviews.text: First time user/buyer kreg jig and new into wood making ! Was contemplating which one to invest. I decided for an upgrade (not really an upgrade...lol as I don't own any jig set) and am glad I did. There are certain projects which entails the use of long and/or huge lumber, plywood, etc and the portable jig has come in handy. Was a bit worried about using it as I never did try one and it went great (try it first on a piece of unwanted lumber, plywood). Follow the instructions and you'll have nicer and stronger finished project. Enjoying my kreg jig and looking forward to more wood projects. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: They look great and are so functional
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Kreg. This thing just works. I have built a headboard for a bed. I have built tables and storage racks and garage storage. My biggest project was two kitchen islands made from old cabinets found at a salvage shop. They look great and are so functional. Thank you Kreg.
customer_reviews.author: barbara lewis

customer_reviews.title: A Must-Have Tool For Your Workbench.
customer_reviews.text: I've seen the Kreg system for years and finally decided to add this to my tool collection and am glad I did. Very simple to use, and the screen doors I built actually look like they were built by someone that knew what he was doing! If you like woodworking, even casually, this is one tool that belongs on your bench.
customer_reviews.author: TopDog1

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought the Kreg System for myself. First time I used it was to build a small bench. It was perfect. The instructions were easy to decipher and made my project much more sturdy and finished.
customer_reviews.author: ckdike

customer_reviews.title: Repairs are a snap
customer_reviews.text: This tool really helped to repair a drawer that had a side which was splitting. Two pocket screws and it was fine. Glad I purchased it. I've used it on many projects since. One con: the instructions for using the extra pieces that, I suppose, extend it's usefulness are almost useless.
customer_reviews.author: dman

customer_reviews.title: Good price for Kreg products.
customer_reviews.text: This kit was a little less than what I found at Lowes. I chose this kit because the one at Lowes did not have the stops this one has. Not sure if Kreg changed what comes in the kits at some point, but this one had the pieces I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Grodsky

customer_reviews.title: Reputable/Reliable Company - Found out first hand that Kreg stands behind their products.
customer_reviews.text: There are so many other very good reviews here justifiably giving good ratings for their Kreg products. I could easily do the same but I'll steer mine more in the direction of Kreg's excellent customer service. I had trouble with the bit breaking as soon as I tried to drill my first hole. I contacted Kreg, and they VERY quickly replied and sent me a replacement bit PLUS a spare! The replacement is working beautifully. I'm extremely pleased with the jig and very impressed with their Customer Service. Kreg obviously stands behind their products. I'll be buying more Kreg product and supplies in the future with confidence. FF
customer_reviews.author: Floridafraze

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.  Makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great setup for anyone who wants to get into woodworking or wants an easy way make pocket hold joints. I bought one for my dad, he loved it and I had to get one for myself. Glad I bought it, I have completed some fun projects with it. My brother has the smaller version that you need to clamp on every time you want to position it, I prefer this one for its ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: A reputation earned by quality
customer_reviews.text: I have learned to wait to posit my reviews after the enthusiasm for the new cools. Kreg's pocket hole jig is good--it works as specified. Kreg makes money off this product because it works. I looked at Porter Cable's system but projected a lack of flexibility (and it was even more expensive). I will seek screws that are cheaper and still work once the ones included in this purchase are gone. Kreg included just enough to make you crazy when you go to use the jig. I'm glad I got the Master System. I may purchase some Kreg brand visegrip type clamps in the near future. Summary:It does what you expect it to do and no surprises and no disappointments.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice wood working kit.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it so I would have more options joining wood. Been playing with it just to check it out. So far my 1st impressions are good. Will be using it a lot more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete parts in Box! Can’t use product.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this package and it’s missing the collar for the arbor Allen key the pin the pole and the knob for the adjustment on the fence I can’t even use this thing because I can’t get the drill bit to work because there’s no caller and now I’m past my return time very very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: julie morrow

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't make a box without it.
customer_reviews.text: A good pocket hole jig is a must have. This system is comprehensive and easy to use. It's good to buy some right angle clamps to go with it depending on the work you're doing because the work pieces can slide a bit as the screws tighten.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Dean

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Great for anything 2 inches or thinner. Anything thicker would required a thicker clamp. Which I think for the price should have been included.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Hinds

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tool!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to use, with great instructions and helpful reference charts. Love being able to easily construct strong pieces without bulky connecting pieces or hardware - perfect for wood joining for beginners. Can't recommend highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Emily M.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it.. now im hooked to Woodworking..
customer_reviews.text: i had easily built a small bench for my daugher in just under an hour.. (well maybe an hour and half),, but it does help dramatically to easily join pieces of wood together. i recommend these Kreg products. Do mind the thickness of the wood before you drill that driver, because if you make a mistake (or forgotten to set the correct thickness), you might drill through the plastic part of the Kreg. I know someone and had read from a forum that some people did this mistake as well.. its not the fault of the product.. you just have to mind the procedures first.. other than that its a great product... 5 stars for me..
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Very easy and fast
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my floating shelves. They turned out great! Now I’m seeing all these possibilities for building furniture and cabinets, it’s really endless. It’s easy to use. I just went on YouTube and there’s tons of tutorials. I thought it was a little pricey but it really is an investment when you think about what you can do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Al deNte

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE, LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE my new toy, I mean, tool! I've made multiple repairs around my home, from dining chairs, bathroom drawers, and unstable side tables. I haven't tried to build major pieces of furniture (yet) only because I can't decide what I want! Easy to use and lots of fun! I won't let my husband use it - I want to have all the fun myself!
customer_reviews.author: Kaycee Vise

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Jig!!
customer_reviews.text: I did an extensive amount of research, reading a lot of product reviews prior to purchasing. I am very happy with this jig!! I have had it for a couple weeks and already completed several projects including a really nice Lego table. It is just as all the others have said, very easy to use, can be used with several types of projects and have already purchased several other Kreg products to add to this. I purchased this package set because it offered the best deal for what you get. I would definitely recommend this jig for anyone who does wood working or simply repairing furniture and things around the home.
customer_reviews.author: JRob

customer_reviews.title: Effective and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I am getting into crafting with wood and this is definitely something great to have for frames and other pieces you want to hide the screws with.
customer_reviews.author: cmm318

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for a woodworker
customer_reviews.text: I am using this on long boards, straight runs and 90 degree angles. Holds the wood much stronger than I ever expected. Don’t think, just buy.
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: Great tool! My initial purchase of this was to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tool! My initial purchase of this was to help build a dinning room table, which it work great. I have also used it to help fix several other pieces of furniture that were broken. Took a little bit of time to figure out the proper set up, I also practiced on a scrap piece of wood to make sure I got the proper results. Kreg also has a great website with videos to help with learning how to use it, as well as plans on how to build =certain items
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for experienced woodworkers and novices alike
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for experienced woodworkers and novices alike. The pilot hole concept isn't a new one but the Kreg Jig makes it so easy to make holes at the right depth for the right wood every time that anyone can use it for home repairs or to create new furniture. If you are just starting out and don't have the money for a joiner give this a try. You will be making beautiful pieces in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Brock Turpin

customer_reviews.title: Total Junk
customer_reviews.text: This this is just junk. Sure, it works, but it works the same way that my screwdriver works as a hammer.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a Great tool I love it. good company fast service arrived very fast
customer_reviews.author: charles johnson

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: Another great KREG product, I just got done building pull out draws for my kitchen, I love it, My worker loved it,
customer_reviews.author: Boss man Fort

customer_reviews.title: Husband is a Master Carpenter and recommends this!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been using his Kreg Jig Master System for a few months now and absolutely loves it! He was sure he would, which is why he asked for it in the first place... BUT he has been making me shelves, and furniture now because it is so much easier for him to accomplish with this tool. He is a Master Carpenter and even takes it to work with him as needed. He's very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: a. adams

customer_reviews.title: Opens doors to a bunch of projects!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, comes with everything this amature needs, and MORE! The downside is that I work with pallets and I will have to buy the micro jig in order to make joints for smaller materials.
customer_reviews.author: David Hendrick

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME, AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME, AWESOME, AWESOME! I put together an 8ft dining table for our house and used the pocket screws underneath the table top and everyone is asking me how I did that and how clean the work looks... VERY much worth the money - I had a hard time spending the money on this as I was thinking is it worth it? Yes, it is... you'll be glad you bought it!
customer_reviews.author: StrattAg21

customer_reviews.title: Good tool
customer_reviews.text: I liked this so much that I sold it and replaced it with the K5 version. It makes strong joints on a variety of woodworking projects.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Abe

customer_reviews.title: Best pocket hole screw jib on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to your tool chest whether you're a hobbyist or professional who builds furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Christen

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I've ony used my Kreg Jig twice but so far it has not let me down! I own a lot of "gimmick" type gadgetry and most isn't worth the box it came in - but I believe this one is different by far. I actually built a small cabinet in less time than it would have taken me just to cut the mortises for the face frame style and rails with my biscuit joiner and the joints are strong and true. Seems to be pretty good quality stuff it's made of - so far I'm happy! I'd recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Keegans

customer_reviews.title: It's Everything I Hoped it Would Be
customer_reviews.text: Great tool, easy to use. Makes woodworking a lot easier. You can also use other screws with a wide head
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: LOVE my Kreg Jig & worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously LOVE my Kreg K4 Jig! I've already used it on 3 projects and plan to use it for many, many more. The only thing I wish I would have done was spend a little more money and got the K5 (newest model) as I can now see how a few of the features on that model could be very helpful. Great value. Easy to use. GREAT tool for study joints. Awesome for DIYers.
customer_reviews.author: Straderade

customer_reviews.title: Great System
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Kreg system. First time I have ever used one but this is fantastic. I made a wonderful headboard and a desk with it. It is plastic, but seems fairly durable. Make sure you have everything set right or you will drill in the plastic, but that is operator error and not product error. Easy to switch pieces, clamps, depths, etc. Would recommend to that hobby wood worker or even the professional. Easy and quick way to hide holes
customer_reviews.author: p

customer_reviews.title: I'm changing my last name to Kreg....
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be more happy with these products. I want them all. They make repetitive jobs so quick and easy. P.s. I know the title made you read this review. You're welcome!
customer_reviews.author: Gene Collins

customer_reviews.title: Coolest tool ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I decided to build 4 coffee tables. I wish I had this when I build my tv entertainment system. It's really easy to use, creates the seamless look I want when two boards or corners are attached to one another. I know there's another set that's a little bit cheaper and doesn't include all of these pieces in the master set. However, I think it's worth the extra few dollars for the pieces you get in the master system. You have to have the right tools to make your project good!
customer_reviews.author: Keota Silaphone

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to set up and all of hole were perfect
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased this item for a Christmas and I have used it to build a table for my daughter. It is very easy to set up and all of hole were perfect. It has saved me a lot of time and made the project a lot stronger and will last. I purchase it again anytime. I would suggest that you purchase some plugs just in case you drill a hole in the wrong place.
customer_reviews.author: ronald.gardner

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs one.
customer_reviews.text: This jig has made so many jobs easier and quicker. Don't know how I got along without it. No more waiting for glue to dry, just use a couple pocket screws to clamp it together and you can get on with the project.
customer_reviews.author: Liam Uncie

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool
customer_reviews.text: A life saver. This little jewel works perfect. I couldn’t live without it any more.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: So easy, anybody can make a joint.
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how much we use this thing for. Shelving, tables, fixing old furniture and toys. The possibilities are really endless with this thing. I use it on my bench, using the clamp system it comes with, but you can also just use it directly onto the piece you're joining. The vacuum attachment works great, but you may need an adaptor for you shop vac. Highly recommend, skilled to basic woodworkes of the world need this jig.
customer_reviews.author: NapaFamily

customer_reviews.title: Best tool ever
customer_reviews.text: We are making a dining room table. It required a bit of practice on extra lumber, but once the learning curve was over, it was all downhill.
customer_reviews.author: Mpohil

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for putting wood peices together
customer_reviews.text: This works great... It takes a few times (for me) to figure out the configuration. Looking at the DVD (or youtube) is a must because there are no written directions. I would have liked some written directions with maybe diagrams since my brain seems to remember and orient itself better. When you figure it out though... wow it works great - and fast too
customer_reviews.author: K. Bard

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jig! It makes what used to be, hard to make connections, easy. The first thing I used it on was an antique mirror that had a cracked frame. Using the Kreg Jig it was easily fixed and you can barely see the crack. After that I built my wife 3 small two tiered tables, totally put together using the Kreg Jig, for her to put plants on and it only took me a few hours to build all 3. One thing I really like is there are no holes to fill, all of the connections are hidden. The Kreg Jig is a tool every woodworker should own!
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Draper

customer_reviews.title: First of two barn doors
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know how I’ve lived without this. My woodwork has certainly never look so good and been so easy. Nice even tight connections.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Johnson-Micks

customer_reviews.title: Quality made and simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my husband, he was impressed by the quality and is looking forward to using this Kreg K4MS jig system on many projects.
customer_reviews.author: shellrenee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this is a great tool! So easy to use, even for a novice like me just getting started. I am excited for the possibilities this opens up. already in the middle of my first project building a shelf using pocket hole joinery, and this jig has made it a snap! Get it, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: E.H.

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid joinery!
customer_reviews.text: Oh, the things I will build! I would suggest getting the 90 degree clamp for appropriate projects. It is hard to hold pieces in place when the threads start into the second piece of wood. Without the 90 degree clamp, the drilled piece wants to "walk". The joints formed using this system are very sturdy. I have only completed a couple of small projects and envision many more to come! EXCELLENT!!!
customer_reviews.author: conservative dad

customer_reviews.title: More useful than originally thought--Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Kreg jig for a specific project (workshop drawers and shelving unit), but it comes in handy for so much more. I rebuilt a saw buck (saw horse for cutting cord wood), using the Kreg for all joints and intersections. It's so much stronger and better now. I also built an outdoor shed for storing cord wood and again, the Kreg made it that much stronger.
customer_reviews.author: av8tor_jim

customer_reviews.title: Useful, but arrived with parts missing
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with two parts missing: the drill bit collar and allen wrench used to install the drill bit collar. Instead of returning the entire package, I'll likely settle for using tape in place of the drill bit collar. Either way, I look forward to using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew A

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I got this set after watching videos about it on the internet. I made a table and it made a very solid top out of three pieces and made attaching the top a breeze. This set has everything I need and have been very happy with my purchase. It takes some moving things around to get everything back in the case once you use it but after a while you used to what goes where. I would recommend this to any woodworker who makes furniture.
customer_reviews.author: DJLohnes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome system
customer_reviews.text: First time doing any woodworking projects since I was in Jr. High shop class. Been wanting to try building stuff for awhile now. Finally worked up the courage to buy this system and I have no regrets. Built a workbench this weekend with plans from the Kreg website. Turned out beautifully and was so simple. The instructional DVD and the website are great for beginners. I will be working on some wall shelves next and then a potting bench.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... are extremely functional and the Jig Master set is great. Pocket screws are a strong and quick way ...
customer_reviews.text: All the Kreg items are extremely functional and the Jig Master set is great. Pocket screws are a strong and quick way to do all kinds of projects from simple stands to custom cabinets and more. I keep a good supply of interior and all weather screws for 2X lumber because I'm always throwing something together. The Kreg newsletter also give you tons of ideas for your home projects too.
customer_reviews.author: Ziegmont

customer_reviews.title: love the Kreg
customer_reviews.text: Love the Kreg system, I've built a bookcase, a toy chest, and a bench using this kit. Wish it wasn't so expensive but you pay for what you get. I bought some cheap-o big box store version of a pocket hole system and it was total crap! Cast aluminum, it drilled two or three nice holes before the bit started to get loose in the guide. Not so with the kreg system. Be sure to order more screws at the time of purchase because you will definitely need them.
customer_reviews.author: Markie Twain

customer_reviews.title: learn from my mistake-buy the k5 not the k4
customer_reviews.text: completely awesome. but don't buy this, buy the k5 (new version). i bought a k4, not knowing the difference. the k5 has significant improvements. i might shell out another $130 just to get the k5. then again i'll probably wait until i have a big job i need to do. good luck to you, this kreg system is just the best.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Gotta love the Kreg jig. My daughter wants to begin wood working. The hardest thing to master: joinery. Not with this tool. While it is not perfect for all applications, it made very short work of my Daughter's first project. I cannot say how well this performed.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This makes little projects so easy! I did have some problems on my first project, which has 1.5" pine- The wood started smoking on each hole. Got to hot. Helps to clean off the bit after each hole drilled. That said, this thing is magic. Makes joints super easy! Go ahead and buy the screw pack too- Only 10 of each of the top 5 screws go with it, and the self tapping screws are great. I'm in love.
customer_reviews.author: Windfall71

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had purchased this much sooner. Easy to set up and use. Makes my projects easier and more professional appearing. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: dBob

customer_reviews.title: Handy jig for cabinets and other assembly.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to put a number of cabinets together and the thought of trying to drill them without a jig was enough to keep me from doing it for the past 4 months. Got the jig and some screws. Once I got the hang of it things moved right along. It works ell and it's pretty good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Bardin

customer_reviews.title: You will love this Jig Setup
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I cant say enough about this product, its worth every penny that I spent on purchasing it. When I first ordered it I was pretty worried as I thought the price was too high for it. Now after having it in my hands and seeing all the advantages to owning this jig setup I would, and definitely will buy it again, when this one wears out. So all in all I would highly recommend this product and rate it 5 stars all around. :)
customer_reviews.author: snoozin99

customer_reviews.title: Incredible pocket hole system
customer_reviews.text: I loved Kreg products. This was an upgrade for me from the K2. It used very stable and the ease of getting the job done is incredible. I was able to put it together right away and get to work. Absolutely love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Abbas Ali

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for the buck.. it was cheaper on Amazon than in the stores. Once you start using these jig's from Kreg you will get addicted to wanting to do more projects. I have used it numerous times for framing and cabinets, wood boxes, etc. When you subscribe they send you emails for free patterns and project ideas.. Good Job Kreg..
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: First Timer=Fantastic Finished Product
customer_reviews.text: While I have dabbled in light carpentry in the past i bought the Kreg for my first indoor furniture project, a 5 drawer dresser. It made the job a real peice of cake. While I would have liked to have had a few more clamps, including specialty, the master system really delivers and is well worth it if you'll be tackling several projects with it. The instructional videos that come with the system are also very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel F. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much like advertised on TV
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars...Really like this product so far. I have used it to make a router table and a range box to use at the local range. One thing I have found out is that if I don't hold the driver and screw pretty much as vertical as I can get them even using the pocket holes, the screws would have a tendency to come through the face of the bottom piece. Holding the drill as vertical as possible seems to alleviate that problem. Other than that, I haven't run up on anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... a jig for all mankind.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my Kreg jig! Makes joinery easy and quick for the novice and expert alike. I mounted the housing and have set-up the Kreg jig on a smaller board, so I can hang it up to save space when not in use. Yes, everything easily fits inside the carrying case, but why hassle with all that? Plus, the included "portable" set-up is great when I need to put a pocket hole or 9 in places that the jig isn't meant to go. Great product... great quality.
customer_reviews.author: The Doctor

customer_reviews.title: A great tool, supporting a great solution to some building challenges
customer_reviews.text: I like custom furniture joints as well as anyone, with hand-cut dovetails being a personal favorite. However, sometimes you are just making something where the joint will never be seen, and strength and speed of creation are paramount. In such a circumstance a pocket hole cannot be beat. This tool is a great addition to my shop.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bill

customer_reviews.title: Happy husband
customer_reviews.text: I buy all this kreg stuff for my husband. He loves wood working and this was the perfect gift for him. He's happy and I'm happy and the product itself is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Land

customer_reviews.title: What a cool tool!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new way to build picture frames and came upon the Kreg jig system. After watching every project video I could find that used this jig - I was sold. So far I have built a workbench, shed doors, and very soon I will be building those picture frames. The master system is a great starting point and I have also purchased the right angle clamp for making boxes. Very ingenious system, works with hard and soft wood of various dimensions. Watch the product videos and I think you'll be impressed with the Kreg system.
customer_reviews.author: M. R. Hayhoe

customer_reviews.title: kreg master kit
customer_reviews.text: if you dont have one of these and you do any wood working projects you owe it to yourself to get one. so much easier and stronger than any other type of joinery. easier than glue, yet you can do both; way easier than biscuits, yet you can use both together as well. you can even use this for repairs on old or new chairs, tables, or whatever. love this. lowes carries the screws if you are low so you can run out and grab some, or order a large container here at amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Johnson

customer_reviews.title: makes life easier
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It's so useful and easy to use once you read the instructions. It makes making furniture much quicker, easier, and enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlynn

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Built three beds, a bench, a picnic table, a desk and a work table so far. I would recommend getting extra drill bits of you intend to use it a lot. They ware out fast.
customer_reviews.author: lcmcama1452

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to work with and does a great job. I’ve used it on many projects.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent user

customer_reviews.title: The Quailty I expect from Kreg
customer_reviews.text: I have many Kreg products and have been happy with all of them. I started out with a smaller pocket hole jig and found it very useful. I also have the deck jig and built my deck with excellent results. The master system is convenient for large projects with a lot of holes to drill, When mounted on a workbench, it is easy to move the piece using the lever action clamp.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Zehner

customer_reviews.title: Kreg is a good system. There are better looking
customer_reviews.text: Kreg is a good system. There are better looking, stronger ways to join wood but this is the easiest and you'll learn a lot about woodworking as you use it, so you can move on to other types of joinery if you want to. Regarding the K4 specifically, note that the clamping lever is on the opposite side of the work from the drill. This can be annoying for larger panels. Consider the K5 if you plan on working with big things.
customer_reviews.author: RDCA

customer_reviews.title: It's great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Fun to use. Professional quality. All that is true and I still feel like it was very expensive. Perhaps if the optional Cary case had been included instead of yet another $40...
customer_reviews.author: David 4fsc

customer_reviews.title: Precision Jig
customer_reviews.text: I love working with kreg tools, I have no complaints except that the vacuum attachment will fall off quite easy. A couple mounting thumb screws for the vacuum attachment would be sufficient for any future re-design. Other than that the price is a little much but appreciate American made products such as this.
customer_reviews.author: Beavman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much a must-have in your toolbox
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much a must-have in your toolbox. I used this when I started a deck project last spring - built a bench and a semi-pergola structure. Absolutely no visible screws anywhere and it's solid as can be, mostly thanks to this jig. I've used it in a dozen other ways since, satisfied each time. It's a remarkably simple tool that does what it's supposed to do. Buy one, seriously.
customer_reviews.author: S Tyler Constantine

customer_reviews.title: Happy hubby and major points for wifey for purchasing it for him!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is absolutely crazy about this system. His work is much better. Shelves, frames, drawers, tables, etc. are turning out to be very sturdy thanks to the Kreg. He says this is the best gift I've got for him in years. He found the learning curve to be excellent, he was using it not long after opening it. This is perfect for anyone who enjoys woodworking.
customer_reviews.author: Christy L

customer_reviews.title: Building ALL THE THINGS now. Do wish it had ...
customer_reviews.text: Building ALL THE THINGS now. Do wish it had come with an organizer, but see now that there are kits that do include that (and it's availble separately at a surprsingly high cost.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Juliano

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got it in the mail and printed some plans off of Kreg's website and built myself a much needed shop bench in a little under 2 hours (setup and initial learning curve included). Can't believe how easy it is to use and how I've lived so long without one. I've already got plans for a coffee table and can't wait to see what else I can do with this!! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: One of the best tools EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I'm totally in love with the Kreg Jig. It's amazing. Pocket holes work wonderful, are strong, and don't even need glue. You can knock out cabinet and furniture projects with ease. I was able to drill almost 100 pocket holes in my recent table project in a matter of about 20 minutes. For anyone that likes working with wood, you MUST have this set in your garage.
customer_reviews.author: Dad Doing Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Handy tool
customer_reviews.text: Got the Kreg Jig Master and started using it right away building a table. Easy to use great addition to my shop.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Street

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how much I love this thing!! Wow what a great tool to have and with a few minutes and an imagination you'll be building some great things that have really good joints. I highly recommend this tool to any enthusiasts and the customer service I received was fantastic. I am very satisfied customer and will continue to buy Kreg products.
customer_reviews.author: Soldier09r

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son in law for a project he was working on and he loved it. Said it was easy to use and gave the product a great finished look.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper310

customer_reviews.title: Will be using this system on some furniture, when ...
customer_reviews.text: Will be using this system on some furniture, when you get this set be sure and get the screws for it.
customer_reviews.author: Elwood Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This system is pretty amazing. We are virtually building professional style furniture with this. We just built a custom changing pad frame for our kid that is coming soon. How had we never heard about this system. Highly recommend for building furniture or repairing furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Adams Family

customer_reviews.title: The best money i have ever sepnt
customer_reviews.text: it makes your life inmencly easier, just make sure you check, re check , and recheck your set up. nd i would also recomend testing on scrap first. use the kreg screws if you can get them (as i am not in america i can't) but in the worst case scenario drywall screws work just fine, just make sure to crank the drill's torque down.
customer_reviews.author: sebastian hanhausen

product_meta.title: Kreg K4MS Jig Master System (K4MS)
product_meta.description:
Style:K4MSThe Do-It-Yourself Kreg Jig® with Bonus Accessories
The Kreg Jig® K4 Master System is a great choice for any woodworking enthusiast looking for a complete set to get started building with Kreg Joinery™. With its solid clamp, large clamping recess, dust collection attachment, material support stop, and removable 3-hole drill guide, this jig truly has it all. The Master System includes a Kreg Jig® K4, Bonus Kreg Accessories: the Kreg Face Clamp, Portable Base, and more.

Large Clamping Recess
The Large Clamping Recess makes it easy to secure your jig to your workbench using Kreg multi-purpose Face Clamps or any common bar clamp or C-clamp.

Sturdy Toggle-Clamp
The Kreg Jig® K4's rear-mounted clamp design has been around since the first Kreg Jig®. It's a proven design, offering incredible rigidity and uncompromising workpiece hold-strength. Adjustments are as easy as releasing the locknut and rotating to the correct setting.

3 Tools in 1
Thanks to its removable Drill Guide, the Kreg Jig® K4 Master System can serve as many different tools: a sturdy benchtop jig that utilizes the benchtop base for high speed pocket holes, a contractor-grade jig for work on the road through the use of the portable base, and a high-quality repair jig when you add spacer blocks to the bottom of the drill guide.

3-Hole Drill Guide
The 3-hole Drill Guide lets you drill pocket holes in a wide variety of material widths and thicknesses—from 1/2" to 1 1/2" in 1/8" increments. Every Kreg Drill Guide features a hardened-steel core, which carries a lifetime guarantee. The core shrouds the bit and supports the workpiece through 100% of the drill-stroke, resulting in minimal bit deflection, reduced tear-out, and a clean, pluggable pocket hole.

Material Support Stop
The Material Support Stop can be set at any distance from the jig to help you repeat the same pocket holes over and over again. The stop can also be swung out of the way to serve as a height support for larger panels.

Glass-Reinforced Nylon Body
The blue body of every Kreg Jig® K4 is made from a heavy-duty, glass-reinforced nylon. This composite material offers the resiliency and flexibility you need without sacrificing the strength and durability Kreg customers have come to expect.

Superior Angle
Unlike competing jigs with a shallower angle of approach, the Kreg Jig® K4 Master System features an optimized drilling angle, specifically designed to increase driving efficiency and minimize the overall size of the pocket hole. The result is a compact pocket hole, less than 1 1/2" in size.

Wood-Chip Relief
The Kreg Jig® K4 Master System includes one wood-chip relief hole for every Drill Guide hole, designed to keep the drill bit clear of excess wood chips, minimize drill torque, increase the longevity of your drill bits, and allow you to complete a perfect pocket hole in just one plunge.

AMAZON.COM
Featuring a removable drill guide for use with benchtop and portable bases, the Kreg Jig Master System is the ultimate pocket-hole jig, and a great choice for any woodworking enthusiast. For precision and accuracy, it offers 1/8-inch incremental settings for materials 1/2-inch to 1-1/2-inch thick and patented three drill guide fixed spacing on the drill guide. A dust collection shroud means no more woodchips, and the clamping recess allows you to use many different styles of clamps to secure your jig to the workbench. For peace of mind, the hardened steel drill guides are backed by a lifetime warranty.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Kreg Jig Master System is the ultimate pocket-hole jig and a great choice for any woodworking enthusiast. Between its solid clamp, large clamping recess, dust-collection attachment, material support stop, removable 3-hole drill guide, and seemingly endless adjustability, this jig truly has it all! The large clamping recess makes it easy to secure your jig to your workbench using Kreg multi-purpose face clamps or any common bar clamp or c-clamp, and the rear-mounted clamp design is a proven design, offering incredible rigidity and uncompromising workpiece hold-strength. Adjustments are as easy as releasing the lock-nut, and rotating to the correct setting. Thanks to the innovative removable drill guide, the Kreg Jig Master can be many tools at once. First, a sturdy bench top jig utilizing the bench top base for high-speed production pocket-holes, then a contractor-grade jig for work on the road through the use of the portable base, and also a high quality repair jig with the addition of spacer blocks to the bottom of the drill guide. The patented 3-hole drill guide lets you make perfectly placed pocket-holes in a wide variety of material widths and thicknesses (from 1/2-Inch to 1-1/2-Inch, in 1/8-Inch increments). Every Kreg drill guide features a hardened steel core which carries a full lifetime guarantee. The core shrouds the bit and supports the workpiece through 100% of the drill-stroke, resulting in minimal bit deflection, reduced tear-out, and a clean pluggable pocket-hole.

See more
feature_bullets: Removable Drill Guide for use with benchtop and portable bases
Patented 3-hole drill guide allows you to make perfectly placed Pocket-Holes in a wide variety of material widths and thicknesses
1/8-Inch incremental settings for materials from 1/2-Inch to 1-1/2-Inch thick
Dust Collection Shroud - Say goodbye to woodchips. The case is not included.
Large clamping recess allows you to use many different styles of clamps to secure your jig to the workbench
Kit contains: Kreg Jig K4, Stepped Drill bit and stop collar, 6" square-drive bit, Starter screw set and plug set, Face clamp, Portable base, Material support stop, Dust collection attachement

specifications.Included Components: Kreg Jig® K4, Kreg® Face Clamp, Portable Base, Drill Guide Spacer, Material Support Stop, dust-collection attachment, 3/8"
